price: Ɛmma moadwen nnyε mo sε, wͻn a wͻnnye nnie no (bɛtumi ama Nyame nhyehyεε) ayε kwa wͻ asaase yi so; wͻn asetena mu ne gyam, na nkyi bͻne paa ne hᴐ.
arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru
